title: Committee system more important in House

content.question: The committee system is more important in the House than in the Senate because

choices.label: the seniority system plays no role in the House and therefore committees must play a larger role
the Constitution mandates the type of committee structure in the House
committee members are appointed by the President
the House is so large that more work can be accomplished in committees than on the floor
the majority party in the House prefers to give priority to the work of the committees

content.answer: the House is so large that more work can be accomplished in committees than on the floor
